predicate.note: Frames file for 'entangle' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: traceless passive
example.text: Warner and Sony are entangled in a legal battle over movie producers Peter Gruber and Jon Peters.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary entangled John in a complicated scheme involving Hershey's syrup, fifteen live toads, and the justices of the US Supreme Court.
example.arg: complicated scheme involving Hershey's syrup, fifteen live toads, and the justices of the US Supreme Court
